name: 林顯易
objective:
簡介,層狀認知網路,倒傳遞網路,學習向量量化網路,自組織映射網路,Hopfisld網路，退火神經網路,應用與實做。
Introduction, layer perceptron, back-propagation network, learning vector qvantization, self-organizing map, hpfield neural network ,annealed neural
network, applications implements.

Week3: Fundamental concepts
Week4: Perceptrons
Week5: Multilayer neural networks and back-propagation
Week6: RBF neural networks 
Week7: Gradient Descent
Week8: Hyper-parameter tuning
Week9: Mid-term project
Week10: Self-organizing map
Week11: Autoencoder
Week12: Restricted boltzmann machine
Week13: Deep Belief Networks
Week14: Convolutional neural networks
Week15: Hopeld netowrks
Week16: Long short-term memory
Week17: Applications of neural networks
